name: IMMZ.DT.03.Polio
description: If child or person has not been vaccinated, give BCG vaccine as soon as possible after birth

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at birth (polio-endemic country and high risk of spread)
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the zero dose recommendation at birth dur to patient being in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread. Patient will continue the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" <= "1 day"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at birth and patient is in a polio-endemic country with high risk of spread

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - No Doses at 6 weeks old
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "6 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because no doses at 6 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 14 weeks old
action.description: Provide Polio (IPV) immunizations – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "14 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 14 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1 Dose given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last bOPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1 dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1 Dose given at least 4 months ago
action.description: Provide Polio (IPV) immunizations – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last IPV dose given" >= "4 months ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1 dose IPV given at least 4 months ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 2 Doses given 4 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "bOPV-IPV-bOPV-IPV-bOPV" schedule (5 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "2 dose" and "Last bOPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 2nd dose bOPV given 4 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - No Doses at 8 weeks old
action.description: Provide Polio (IPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" >= "8 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because no doses at 8 weeks old

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last IPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Last IPV dose given" <= "8 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 1st Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide Polio (IPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last IPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Last IPV dose given" <= "8 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (IPV) because 1st dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1st Dose (Second dose in 3-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (3 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose" and "Last bOPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Last bOPV dose given" <= "8 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose bOPV (Second dose in 3-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (IPV) - 2nd Dose given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scenario)
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.description: "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "2 dose" and "Last IPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Last IPV dose given" <= "8 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 2nd dose IPV given 4-8 weeks ago (High risk of exposure scneario)

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio (bOPV) - 1st Dose (Third dose in 4-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago
action.description: Provide Polio (bOPV) immunizations – using the "IPV-IPV-bOPV-bOPV" schedule (4 doses scheme)

expression.description:
"Polio (bOPV) vaccine immunization history" = "1 dose"
and "Polio (IPV) vaccine immunization history" = "2 doses" and "Last bOPV dose given" >= "4 weeks ago" and "Last bOPV dose given" <= "8 weeks ago"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient for Polio (bOPV) because 1st dose bOPV (Third dose in 4-dose schedule) given 4-8 weeks ago

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - No Doses
action.description: Provide IPV immunizations – using the "IPV Only" schedule

expression.description: "IPV vaccine immunization history" = "No-doses" and "Patient age" <= "8 weeks"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 1st dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 2nd dose
action.description: Provide IPV immunizations - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 2nd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 3rd dose
action.description: Provide IPV immunizations - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 3rd dose

action.title: Immunize Patient for Polio - 4th dose
action.description: Provide IPV immunizations - using the "IPV Only" schedule - minimum of 4 weeks after previous dose

expression.description: "IPV vaccine immunization history" = "3 IPV doses" and "1st IPV dose was given" < "8 weeks" and "Patient age" >= "6 months"
expression.expression: Should vaccinate patient with IPV 4th dose
